en-US.title: Gambit - Party Game
en-US.subtitle: Prompts, Dares & Chaos
en-US.description:
Turn any gathering into an unforgettable night. Gambit generates personalized prompts using your friends' names across 8 categories — from icebreakers to pure chaos.

FEATURES

• Multiple game modes: Classic, Hot Seat, Couples, Truth or Dare
• 8 categories: Forfeits, Dares, Confessions, Hot Takes, Physical, Social, Creative, and Pure Chaos
• Adjustable chaos level — dial it up or keep it chill
• Player name substitution makes every prompt personal
• Score tracking and drink counter
• Save favorites and create your own custom prompts
• 480+ prompts included free

GAMBIT PRO

Unlock 225+ premium prompts:
• 100+ exclusive party prompts
• 75+ extreme chaos challenges
• 50+ adult-only prompts (21+)

Designed for adults 18+. No accounts, no ads. Your game, your rules.
